testcaseName: Adult dose mistakenly given to a child.  Counts as valid.
generalDescription: This test case describes when an adult dose of the Hep A vaccine is erroneously administered to a child, that the dose is considered valid.  The second (age appropriate ) dose should be forecasted.
reasonForChange: Past Due Date was previously calculated based on an interval, but should have been calculated based on age of 24 months + 4 weeks - 1 day
